page.title: 17COMMUNITY COUNCIL ACTIVITIES
page.content: The Community Council organises it to raise money for the village and hundreds of people come along. To start it off we have a big procession. First of all we have the Community Council May Queen and her two attendants who are chosen during April, then comes the May Queen for the church and her attendants. The clown follows and then come the Majorettes. There are a lot of stalls set up along the sides of the road. There are cake stalls, bookstalls, clothes stalls, Lucky Dips and many more. Half of the proceeds go to the Community Council and the other half goes to the stall holders. There are also stalls with competitions and there is usually an exhibition in the village hall. There are entertainers and a Grand Draw.
